textBox.richText: I just uploaded 3 documents that Disney is allowing me to share with the RenderMan community. One is some notes that Brent Burely put together as he was trying to understand filtering in PRMan. These can be found in the show and tell section: PRMan Filtering The other two documents are two parts of a talk that Mark Hammel and I gave at Disney Animation back in the winter of 2007. These can be found in the Publications section: RenderMan Nuts & Bolts.
